# kup-upload



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property      | Attribute | Description | Type          | Default     |
| ------------- | --------- | ----------- | ------------- | ----------- |
| `typeOptions` | --        |             | `UploadProps` | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event                 | Description                       | Type                                |
| --------------------- | --------------------------------- | ----------------------------------- |
| `ketchupFileRejected` | Launched when file upload fail    | `CustomEvent<{ message: string; }>` |
| `ketchupFileUploaded` | Launched when file upload succeed | `CustomEvent<{ message: string; }>` |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                                                    | Description             |
| ------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------- |
| `--fup-background-color, --kup-upload_background-color` | upload background color |
| `--fup-color, --kup-upload_color`                       | upload text color       |
| `--fup-dim, --kup-upload_dimension`                     | upload dimension        |
